title: [Large-scale] Feedback Utilization Strategies to Facilitate Informal Workplace Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of organizational learning concepts and workplace experience
context.additional_context: Mobile-accessible microlearning content delivery for office/administrative professionals, aiming to enhance learning effectiveness through organizational knowledge accessibility and feedback frequency analysis

learning_goals: Learners can explain the connection between new ways of working (NWW) in the workplace and informal learning
Learners can design and implement personalized learning strategies using feedback frequency
Learners can propose methods for utilizing ICT tools to enhance organizational knowledge accessibility
Learners achieve 80% or higher in summative assessments measuring learning outcomes
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
